title: pbe bug?
body: it says that i don't own any champion on the pbe, even though i've had my account for a while? and i have all these skins unlocked... and when i go to re-buy all the champs, the purchase won't go through. am i alone in this ?

replies.body:
Hey boney,

This is working as intended. We're removing some content so players can test the Loot System. You can read more about that [here](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/NrHLa4Em-loot-system-testing-on-pbe).
in the corner where it has popular skins, it still says i own them even though now i have zero champs :/ i think it's a bug and i hope they fix it soon... i wanted to check out jhin
I have the same problem and I don't know if it's a bug or what... In the shop there are the champ bundles, but I don't want to loss my skins and stuff =/
